header.subtitle: A full-stack developer who specializes in building exceptional experiences for the web
header.question: Want to talk?

who-am-i.title: So, <0>about me</0>
who-am-i.content-1: As a software developer with over 6 years of experience, I have honed my skills in full-stack development, specializing in JavaScript and React. My journey in software development has been marked by a passion for solving complex problems and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions. I've had the privilege of working on diverse projects, from e-commerce platforms to data-driven applications, where I've consistently achieved measurable results, such as improving load times by 50% and decreasing the development time by about 30%.
who-am-i.content-2: My dedication to staying updated with emerging technologies and my enthusiasm for crafting innovative solutions drive my continued success in this ever-evolving field. Today, these are some of the tools that I have experience with:

works.title: HoyTrabajas
description: I worked as a full-stack developer in multiple functionalities of the platform, including the layout, user interface and experience, the management of the database and the implementation of business logic.
works.techUsed: JavaScript, React, Ruby on Rails, RSpec, Docker, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL

works.title: Umany
description: I was responsible for the complete development of the platform, including UI & UX design through Figma, and the implementation of the business logic through continuous delivery and integration.
works.techUsed: TypeScript, React, Tailwind, NextJS, Remix, PostgreSQL, Docker

works.title: TappShare
description: I created a redesign contemplating a new user experience from scratch. It included the landing page and the dashboard section.

works.title: Commercium Bank
description: I worked as a freelancer in the design and implementation of the landing page.

works.title: GoShop
description: I worked as a freelancer in the implementation of themes for the platform's individual stores, making visual and technical adjustments regarding the particular functionalities of each theme in question.

works.title: Slatam
description: Slatam is a side project that has helped me to test how different tools of the JavaScript ecosystem can work together. It was a full-stack practice.
works.techUsed: TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind, GraphQL, NestJS, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, Docker

works.title: JobCirc
description: One of the first projects in which I participated as a freelancer. My contribution was oriented to the visual part, although I was also involved in some functionalities of the backend made in Wordpress.

send-message.title: Message me
send-message.subtitle: Want to say something? I'm glad to hear it!
send-message.content-successful:
Thank you for your message, {{name}}. 

I will contact you soon!

message.label: Message
message.required: What do you want to say?
message.min-length: Sorry. Your message is too short
